flawed_nl_solution:
After giving the boy his stickers, she has 100 - 10 = <<100-10=90>>90 stickers left.
She gives her best friends 90 / 2 = <<90/2=54>>54 stickers
This leaves Clara with 90 - 54 stickers = <<90-54=36>>36 stickers.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
